name: pulss-white-label-platform
description: Multi-tenant white-label e-commerce platform for pharmacies, groceries, and local businesses

scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=@pulss/backend && npm run lint --workspace=@pulss/storefront && npm run lint --workspace=@pulss/admin-dashboard
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=@pulss/backend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=@pulss/storefront && npm run lint:fix --workspace=@pulss/admin-dashboard
scripts.db:generate: docker-compose exec backend sh -c 'cd /app/packages/database && npx prisma generate'
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec backend sh -c 'cd /app/packages/database && npx prisma migrate dev'
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose exec backend sh -c 'cd /app/packages/database && npm run seed'
scripts.db:studio: docker-compose exec backend sh -c 'cd /app/packages/database && npx prisma studio'
